data.text:
My latest photo-blog on Badami. This is an important monument, virtually a vast laboratory where temple architecture was first experimented on in the 6th century. Do watch on a bigger screen, to see details of phenomenal Chalukyan architecture. https://lnkd.in/gUK6ktif #badami #ancientindia #temples #ancientindianknowledge

Harnessing the Power of Umbartha: A Comprehensive Guide to Placing Essentials in a North-Facing House Introduction In Vastu Shastra, the ancient Indian science of architecture and design, the placement of objects within a house holds significant importance. One crucial aspect of Vastu Shastra is Umbartha, the north-facing wall or corner where auspicious items are placed to invite positive energies into the home. This article aims to provide guidance on the placement of Umbartha in a north-facing house, outlining the significance of items to be kept in Umbartha and suggesting suitable wood for constructing these essential components. READ MORE:https://lnkd.in/dinxHsMa

"Exploring the timeless beauty of ancient Nepali architecture in the mountain region, near the breathtaking Shey Phoksundo Lake and the charming Ringmo Village. This traditional structure stands as a testament to our rich cultural heritage and the incredible craftsmanship of our ancestors. Proud to share a glimpse of Nepal's architectural legacy with my network. #Nepal #CulturalHeritage #Architecture #MountainLife #SheyPhoksundo #RingmoVillage"

The Tehran Beton Residential Complex in District 18, Tehran represents a transformative #urban_development project, replacing the former Tehran Beton factory with a #green_residential_complex haven. Inspired by the historical significance of cement, the architecture incorporates concrete surfaces and a central courtyard adorned with nature. Attention to light and radiation optimizes #climatic_comfort, while diverse dwelling units promote #social_cohesion. Developed by Avers Consulting Company in collaboration with Sheyda Taqizadeh and Hooman Zand, this project marks a poetic milestone in architectural innovation, blending history with modernity.

Explore the unique blend of traditional and modern architecture at the striking Ajimpur Kabaristan in Dhaka. Read about the juxtaposition of serenity and urban bustle surrounding the Mohammad Hanif Mosque. Experience the captivating charm of this historical site. Learn more here: [https://ift.tt/OQKl3oy]
